title: Girl raped and abducted in Oxford - live updates - BBC News
summary: schoolgirl abducted and raped in oxford .
thames valley police looking for silver hatchback .

documents.title: that 's all from oxfordshire live
text: we 're are closing today 's live coverage of the abduction and rape of a young girl , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday with the latest on this story and the rest of the day 's headlines .
join us then .

documents.title: abducted schoolgirl raped by men
text: here is the latest after a teenage girl who was abducted while walking to school was raped by `` more than one man '' , according to police .

documents.title: get involved : your views on the oxford abduction
text: there are a lot of schools in that area of north oxford .
there will be thousands of very scared kids now .
awful .
if anybody saw anything on the school run/way to work-it could be really important

documents.title: vice-chancellor writes to oxford brookes students after abduction
text: the vice-chancellor of oxford brookes university has written to students in the wake of the abduction of a schoolgirl in the city .
professor alistair fitt encouraged students to follow police advice on staying safe while out and about , and to use university bus services .
oxford is for the most part a safe city to live in .
however , it is important that you take care to look after yourselves and one another .

documents.title: police step up patrols to reassure shocked community
text: supt christian bunt , the local police commander for oxford , says patrols will be stepped up in the wake of the abduction of rape of a schoolgirl in the summertown area .
this type of extremely serious crime is fortunately very rare in oxford but is still very worrying .
i am putting in place additional patrols to provide reassurance .
we will also be working closely with the local schools to provide information and support .
we will keep the community updated with information as i recognise that parents in particular will be very concerned by the nature of this incident .

documents.title: abduction took place in summertown area of oxford
text: the abduction took place near marston ferry road and banbury road in oxford , at 08:25 bst on wednesday .
she was then found three hours later about a mile away on cavendish drive .
were you in the summertown area yesterday morning between 08:25 and 12:00 ?
did you see a small silver hatchback containing two white men and a girl wearing school uniform ?
call police on 101 or crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555111 .

documents.title: oxford abduction : victim is 'extremely traumatised and upset '
text: the teenage victim is `` extremely traumatised and upset '' after the attack .
det supt ward added .
he said he did n't believe she knew her attackers , and he was not sure she was dragged into the vehicle - a small silver hatchback .
`` did someone see something that appeared innocent that was n't ? ''
he asked .

documents.title: 'i need your help ' says detective
text: det supt ward added he understood people 's shock at what had happened to the schoolgirl , and appealed for their help .
as a parent i know how shocking this is for people .
we have a very large investigation ongoing and i need the public 's help .

documents.title: police say silver car is 'key ' to investigation
text: police say a small silver hatchback , possibly a volkswagen , is `` the key to all this '' .
det supt chris ward said the schoolgirl was raped inside the car in `` a small geographical area '' in summertown , between 08:25 and 12:00 yesterday .
he said he believed the `` extremely traumatised '' victim did not know her attackers , but did not think she had been dragged into the car .
he has urged anyone who saw a small silver car in the area acting sus and with two white men and a girl wearing school uniform inside , to contact police on 101 or via crimestoppers .
drivers with dash cams and cyclists with helmet cams who were in the area are being asked to view their footage for anything that may help with the investigation .

documents.title: oxford abduction : teenage girl raped in car by two men
text: a teenage girl who was abducted while walking to school was raped by two men in a car , police have said .
the girl , who was wearing a school uniform , was grabbed near marston ferry road and banbury road in oxford at 08:25 bst on wednesday .
she was driven away by two white men in a small silver hatchback , possibly a volkswagen , and found more than three hours later about a mile away .
police have appealed to the public to track down the vehicle .

documents.title: breakingkey points from the press conference
text: det supt chris ward from thames valley police has just finished a press conference , in which more details about the abduction and sexual assault of a schoolgirl in oxford yesterday .

documents.title: breakingoxford abduction - live press conference
text: thames valley police are hosting a press conference following the abduction of a school girl in oxford .
it is due to start around 2pm and you can watch it live below .

documents.title: oxford abduction : residents shocked in cavendish drive
text: residents of cavendish drive , where the schoolgirl was found after being abducted and sexually assaulted , have spoken of their shock .

documents.title: abduction of girl a 'parent 's nightmare '
text: ward councillor elizabeth wade has described the abduction of an oxford schoolgirl as `` shocking '' .

she added : `` it 's a close community and we do n't have very much crime , so this is the last thing we would have expected here , and i know the whole community will be very concerned about the girl herself and other young people in the community .
`` there are a lot of schools herethroughout the day there are children coming and going , and it 's always been a very comfortable place to be , and now we 've got every parents ' nightmare . ''

she described the area as `` incredibly busy and a major crossing between two bits of oxford [ so ] it should have been a completely safe place for this girl to be '' and advised children to look out for each other `` at least until whoever perpetrated this terrible thing has been caught '' .

documents.title: police out in force after abduction and sexual assault
text: police are comnbing cavendish drive looking for clues

documents.title: forensics team at cavendish drive
text: police forensics teams have been looking for evidence on cavendish drive where the abducted schoolgirl was found knocking on doors for help .

documents.title: abduction in city 'unusual and unprecedented '
text: our reporter brennan nicholls has been giving victoria derbyshire all the information we know on the oxford schoolgirl abduction so far .

documents.title: abduction took place at rush hour
text: i 'm standing in the area where police say the abduction took place .
it happened during rush hour in a busy part of the city .
police say people may have witnessed the abduction but not realised what was going on or just how serious the situation was .
i 've seen police vans go past me so hopefully people will feel reassured by the number of police out this morning .
the victim is now being supported by specially-trained officers .
author: Kate Gibson
BBC Oxford News

documents.title: police looking for witnesses to abduction
text: regarding the abduction of a schoolgirl in north oxford , det ch insp simon steel , who is leading the investigation , said : `` i would appreciate the public 's help in relation to this very serious incident .
`` this happened in what would have been a very busy area at this time of the day and i appeal to anybody who was in that area to call police immediately .
`` it is possible you may have witnessed this incident and may not have realised the severity of the situation . ''
the girl was found later by officers on cavendish drive after she knocked on doors in the area .

documents.title: girl abducted walking to school
text: a teenage girl walking to school was abducted by two men and subjected to a serious sexual assault .
the girl , who was wearing her school uniform , was grabbed off the street near marston ferry road and banbury road at about 08:25 bst yesterday .
she was driven away by two men in a silver car and found more than three hours later about a mile away , knocking on doors and seeking help .
police warned children walking to school to stay in groups .

documents.title: good morning
text: hello and welcome to oxfordshire live .
we 'll be bringing you all the latest headlines across the day as they happen .
you can get in touch with us via email , facebook or twitter .
